remix_prompts: Create a decision tree for something personal — like classifying your moods, outfits, or music.
Make a remix where every branch of your decision tree reflects a value or justice principle.
Swap datasets — could your classifier work on voting methods, art movements, or community needs?
Design a protest version: A classifier that detects algorithmic injustice instead of enabling it.
Add randomness — what if your classifier had to guess based on incomplete data?
